articles.description: Manager Rocco Baldelli said the Twins coaching staff needs to "answer some pretty hard questions" about the offensive issues that led to the team scoring only three runs while losing all three games in Atlanta.
articles.content:
ATLANTA On getaway days, there is always a time listed somewhere around the Twins' clubhouse for when the bus will depart for the airport.
No time was written Wednesday after the Twins were swept by… [+4133 chars]

articles.author: Jack Milko
articles.title: PGA Tour VP shares who is really in 'control' of LIV Golf amid Saudi deal - SB Nation
articles.description: Amid so much uncertainty surrounding the PGA Tour’s deal with the Saudi’s PIF, the EVP of the tour made a very direct statement as to who is in control.
articles.content: Following the agreement between the PGA Tour and the Saudi Arabian Public Investment Fund (PIF), the future structure of professional golf is uncertain. Yet, PGA Tour officials are adamant that the t… [+3124 chars]
